title: Experiential Learning and Community of Inquiry Program for Online Teaching Development Competency Enhancement

context.prior_knowledge: Basic science knowledge and general understanding of curricula
context.additional_context: A collaborative learning program conducted in smartphone-centric limited-technology environments

learning_goals: Learners can explain at least three design principles of online faculty development programs
Learners can develop one educational scenario applying the experiential learning model
Learners can produce instructional materials incorporating peer feedback using the community of inquiry framework

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
